The tag creates a new session and exposes the session-id via the variable set in the attribute var. If var is not given, the session-id is exposed via the variable formSessionId.

The attribute configPath is mandatory. Here the OpenCms VFS URI of the UGC configuration content that should be used to set up the session is given. Value ${content.filename} will yield the according URI if you use the tag in the formatter of a UGC configuration. This is recommended.
